## Problem Statement

A clear description of what problem this feature would solve.

## Proposed Solution

Describe the solution you'd like.

## Alternatives Considered

Any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

## Domain Context

If applicable, cite relevant actuarial or financial theory:
- [ ] [T1] Academically validated (cite source)
- [ ] [T2] Empirically observed (describe data)
- [ ] [T3] Assumption/hypothesis (justify)

## Additional Context

Any other context, references, or related issues.
